title: FM reaffirms Pakistan’s unequivocal support to rights of Palestinians
content:
ISLAMABAD, March 23 (APP): Foreign Minister Makhdoom Shah Mahmood Qureshi on Wednesday reaffirmed Pakistan’s unequivocal support for the rights of Palestinian people and their just struggle.
He also underscored that Pakistan’s principled position reflected the sentiments of Pakistani people.
The Foreign Minister Qureshi met Palestinian Foreign Minister Dr. Riyad Al Maliki, on sidelines of the 48th Session of the OIC Council of Foreign Ministers.
Foreign minister Maliki expressed gratitude for Pakistan’s unwavering support and principled stance on Palestine, including at the United Nations (UN) and Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC).
The two foreign ministers also reviewed the bilateral relationship between Pakistan and Palestine, in addition to exchanging views on regional and international issues.
